language:
<entry name="GaiansProperties" value="Environmental safeguards: -20% pollution and -20% alien aggression
Experience with life systems & recycling: +40% credits from taxes
Pacifist tendencies: -10% power
+1 Nutrients in fungus squares
Freedom loving: -1 morale
Begins with a Former"/> <entry name="GaiansQuote" value=""In the great commons at Gaia's Landing we have a tall and particularly beautiful stand of white pine, planted at the time of the first colonies. It represents our promise to the people, and to Planet itself, never to repeat the tragedy of Earth."
-- Lady Deirdre Skye, Planet Dreams"/>
<entry name="GaiansWelcome" value=""In the great commons at Gaia's Landing we have a tall and particularly beautiful stand of white pine, planted at the time of the first colonies. It represents our promise to the people, and to Planet itself, never to repeat the tragedy of Earth."
-- Lady Deirdre Skye, Planet Dreams"/>
<entry name="HiveProperties" value="Rapid population growth: +20% growth
Brutal serfdom: +20% production from workers
Little political freedom: 40% worse prices
Begins with Adaptive Fortifications"/> <entry name="HiveQuote" value=""Learn to overcome the crass demands of flesh and bone, for they warp the matrix through which we perceive the world. Extend your awareness outwards, beyond the self of body, to embrace the self of group and the self of humanity. The goals of the group and the greater race are transcendent, and to embrace them is to achieve enlightenment."
-- Chairman Sheng-ji Yang, Essays on Mind and Matter"/>
<entry name="HiveWelcome" value=""Learn to overcome the crass demands of flesh and bone, for they warp the matrix through which we perceive the world. Extend your awareness outwards, beyond the self of body, to embrace the self of group and the self of humanity. The goals of the group and the greater race are transcendent, and to embrace them is to achieve enlightenment."
-- Chairman Sheng-ji Yang, Essays on Mind and Matter"/>
<entry name="MorganProperties" value="Wealthy: +100 starting credits
Followers have expensive tastes: +20% unit upkeep
Industrial conglomerate: 20% better prices
Creature comforts at a premium: -2 habitat
Begins with Reinforced Steel Plates"/> <entry name="MorganQuote" value=""Human behavior is economic behavior. The particulars may vary, but competition for limited resources remains a constant. Need as well as greed have followed us to the stars, and the rewards of wealth still await those wise enough to recognize this deep thrumming of our common pulse."
-- CEO Nwabudike Morgan, The Centauri Monopoly"/>
<entry name="MorganWelcome" value=""Human behavior is economic behavior. The particulars may vary, but competition for limited resources remains a constant. Need as well as greed have followed us to the stars, and the rewards of wealth still await those wise enough to recognize this deep thrumming of our common pulse."
-- CEO Nwabudike Morgan, The Centauri Monopoly"/>
<entry name="BelieveProperties" value="+25% bonus when attacking enemies, from strength of convictions
Citizens eager to defend faith: -40% unit upkeep
Suspicious of secular science: -40% research from scientists
Believe Planet is their promised land: +20% pollution and +20% alien aggression
Begins with Holographic Projections"/> <entry name="BelieveQuote" value=""The righteous need not cower before the drumbeat of human progress. Though the song of yesterday fades into the challenge of tomorrow, God still watches and judges us. Evil lurks in the datalinks as it lurked in the streets of yesteryear. But it was never the streets that were evil."
-- Sister Miriam Godwinson, The Blessed Struggle"/>
<entry name="BelieveWelcome" value=""The righteous need not cower before the drumbeat of human progress. Though the song of yesterday fades into the challenge of tomorrow, God still watches and judges us. Evil lurks in the datalinks as it lurked in the streets of yesteryear. But it was never the streets that were evil."
-- Sister Miriam Godwinson, The Blessed Struggle"/>
<entry name="PeaceProperties" value="U.N. style bureaucracy: -20% credits from taxes
+2 habitat
Begins with Biogenetics"/> <entry name="PeaceQuote" value=""As the Americans learned so painfully in Earth's final century, free flow of information is the only safeguard against tyranny. The once-chained people whose leaders at last lose their grip on information flow will soon burst with freedom and vitality, but the free nation gradually constricting its grip on public discourse has begun its rapid slide into despotism. Beware of he who would deny you access to information, for in his heart he dreams himself your master."
-- Commissioner Pravin Lal, U.N. Declaration of Rights"/>
<entry name="PeaceWelcome" value=""As the Americans learned so painfully in Earth's final century, free flow of information is the only safeguard against tyranny. The once-chained people whose leaders at last lose their grip on information flow will soon burst with freedom and vitality, but the free nation gradually constricting its grip on public discourse has begun its rapid slide into despotism. Beware of he who would deny you access to information, for in his heart he dreams himself your master."
-- Commissioner Pravin Lal, U.N. Declaration of Rights"/>
<entry name="SpartansProperties" value="Well-armed survivalist movement: +20% power
Highly disciplined followers: +1 morale
Extravagant weapons are costly: -20% production from workers
Begins with Analytical Dynamics"/> <entry name="SpartansQuote" value=""Superior training and superior weaponry have, when taken together, a geometric effect on overall military strength. Well-trained, well-equipped troops can stand up to many more times their lesser brethren than linear arithmetic would seem to indicate."
-- Spartan Battle Manual"/>
<entry name="SpartansWelcome" value=""Superior training and superior weaponry have, when taken together, a geometric effect on overall military strength. Well-trained, well-equipped troops can stand up to many more times their lesser brethren than linear arithmetic would seem to indicate."
-- Spartan Battle Manual"/>
<entry name="UnivProperties" value="Brilliant research: +40% research from scientists
Lack of ethics: -2 morale
Begins with Quantization"/> <entry name="UnivQuote" value=""The substructure of the universe regresses infinitely towards smaller and smaller components. Behind atoms we find electrons, and behind electrons quarks. Each layer unraveled reveals new secrets, but also new mysteries."
-- Academician Prokhor Zakharov, For I Have Tasted The Fruit"/>
<entry name="UnivWelcome" value=""The substructure of the universe regresses infinitely towards smaller and smaller components. Behind atoms we find electrons, and behind electrons quarks. Each layer unraveled reveals new secrets, but also new mysteries."
-- Academician Prokhor Zakharov, For I Have Tasted The Fruit"/>
<entry name="CyborgProperties" value="Human research abilities enhanced by algorithmic control: +40% research from scientists
Cybernetic biologicals extremely efficient: +40% credits from taxes
Humans 'possessed by an algorithm' find reproduction awkward: -20% growth
Begins with Quantization"/> <entry name="CyborgQuote" value=""Those who join us need give up only half of their humanity--the illogical, ill-tempered, and disordered half, commonly thought of as 'right-brain' functioning. In exchange, the 'left-brain' capacities are increased to undreamed potential. The tendency of Biologicals to cling instead to their individual personalities can only be attributed to archaic evolutionary tendencies."
-- Prime Function Aki Zeta-Five, Convergence"/>
<entry name="CyborgWelcome" value=""Those who join us need give up only half of their humanity--the illogical, ill-tempered, and disordered half, commonly thought of as 'right-brain' functioning. In exchange, the 'left-brain' capacities are increased to undreamed potential. The tendency of Biologicals to cling instead to their individual personalities can only be attributed to archaic evolutionary tendencies."
-- Prime Function Aki Zeta-Five, Convergence"/>
<entry name="PiratesProperties" value="Individualistic mentality opposed to central organization: -20% credits from taxes
Culture does not place high emphasis on family: -20% growth
Culture and technology adapted for the ocean: +1 minerals from ocean tiles, +2 minerals from coast tiles
Begins with Analytical Dynamics and Naval Transportation Logistics"/> <entry name="PiratesQuote" value=""The sea ... vast, mysterious ... and full of wealth! And the nations of Planet send their trade across it without a thought. Well, the sea doesn't care about them, so it lets them pass. But we can give the sea a little hand in teaching the landlubbers a lesson in humility."
-- Captain Ulrik Svensgaard, The Ripple and the Wave"/>
<entry name="PiratesWelcome" value=""The sea ... vast, mysterious ... and full of wealth! And the nations of Planet send their trade across it without a thought. Well, the sea doesn't care about them, so it lets them pass. But we can give the sea a little hand in teaching the landlubbers a lesson in humility."
-- Captain Ulrik Svensgaard, The Ripple and the Wave"/>
<entry name="DroneProperties" value="Excellent craftsmen and skilled workers: +40% production from workers
Emphasis on productivity instead of 'blue-sky' research: -40% research from scientists
Working for common good reduces discontent: +1 morale
Begins with Reinforced Steel Plates"/> <entry name="DroneQuote" value=""Now it's day and night the irons clang, and like poor galley slaves
We toil and toil, and when we die, must fill dishonored graves
But some dark night, when everything is silent in the town
I'll shoot those tyrants one and all, I'll gun the flogger down
I'll give the land a little shock, remember what I say,
And they'll yet regret they've sent Jim Jones in chains to Botany Bay."
-- "Jim Jones", Traditional"/>
<entry name="DroneWelcome" value=""Now it's day and night the irons clang, and like poor galley slaves
We toil and toil, and when we die, must fill dishonored graves
But some dark night, when everything is silent in the town
I'll shoot those tyrants one and all, I'll gun the flogger down
I'll give the land a little shock, remember what I say,
And they'll yet regret they've sent Jim Jones in chains to Botany Bay."
-- "Jim Jones", Traditional"/>
<entry name="AngelsProperties" value="Decentralized, difficult to control: -1 morale
Begins with Quantization"/> <entry name="AngelsQuote" value=""What's more important, the data or the jazz? Sure, sure, 'Information should be free' and all that--but anyone can set information free. The jazz is in how you do it, what you do it to, and in almost getting caught without getting caught. The data is 1's and 0's. Life is the jazz."
-- Datatech Sinder Roze, Infobop"/>
<entry name="AngelsWelcome" value=""What's more important, the data or the jazz? Sure, sure, 'Information should be free' and all that--but anyone can set information free. The jazz is in how you do it, what you do it to, and in almost getting caught without getting caught. The data is 1's and 0's. Life is the jazz."
-- Datatech Sinder Roze, Infobop"/>
<entry name="FungboyProperties" value="Devoted to promoting native growth: -40% pollution and -40% alien aggression
Reluctant to pollute environment: -20% production from workers
Disinterested in wealth and its trappings: 20% worse prices
Begins with Holographic Projections"/> <entry name="FungboyQuote" value=""Mankind has been blind for thousands of years-for all of its history. We have come to a place whose wonders are a hundred-fold more amazing than anything on Earth. Around us is clear evidence of the will of a higher power. I bring the Vision to the blind eyes of men. I bring the Word to the deaf ears of men. I will make them see it. I will make them hear it."
-- Prophet Cha Dawn, Planet Rising"/>
<entry name="FungboyWelcome" value=""Mankind has been blind for thousands of years-for all of its history. We have come to a place whose wonders are a hundred-fold more amazing than anything on Earth. Around us is clear evidence of the will of a higher power. I bring the Vision to the blind eyes of men. I bring the Word to the deaf ears of men. I will make them see it. I will make them hear it."
-- Prophet Cha Dawn, Planet Rising"/>
<entry name="CaretakeProperties" value="+25% Defensive combat: Can sense and manipulate "Resonance" fields
Understand workings of Planet, the Sixth Manifold: -20% pollution and -20% alien aggression
Make Planetfall with a Mk I Battle Ogre and extra Colony Pod
All combat units have 2-square sighting radius ("Resonance" sensitivity)
Begins with a Former"/> <entry name="CaretakeQuote" value=""Tau Ceti Flowering: Horrors visited upon neighboring systems must never be repeated. Therefore: if it means the end of our evolution as a species, so be it."
-- Caretaker Lular H'minee, Sacrifice: Life"/>
<entry name="CaretakeWelcome" value=""Tau Ceti Flowering: Horrors visited upon neighboring systems must never be repeated. Therefore: if it means the end of our evolution as a species, so be it."
-- Caretaker Lular H'minee, Sacrifice: Life"/>
<entry name="UsurperProperties" value="Abuse Planet's resources for their own gain: +20% growth
Warlike culture: +10% power
Planet senses Usurper's dark intent: +20% pollution and +20% alien aggression
+25% Offensive combat: Can sense & manipulate "Resonance" fields
Begin game with a Mk I Battle Ogre and extra Colony Pod
All combat units have 2-square sighting radius ("Resonance" sensitivity)
Begins with Biogenetics"/> <entry name="UsurperQuote" value=""Risks of Flowering: considerable. But rewards of godhood: who can measure?"
-- Usurper Judaa Marr, Courage: To Question"/>
<entry name="UsurperWelcome" value=""Risks of Flowering: considerable. But rewards of godhood: who can measure?"
-- Usurper Judaa Marr, Courage: To Question"/>
